settings.richtext: Just discovered us? Try one of our products today and save 10% on your entire order!

settings.title: Zooki
settings.text:
Our Zooki supplements are nutritious, delicious and formulated using the latest research and development. Each Zooki has been uniquely tailored to the nutrient it delivers and is designed to maximise impact, bioavailability, taste and stability.

Our current Zooki range includes Omega 3 and Vitamin C, but we have a lot of exciting announcements to make over the next few months that have been years in the making...

settings.title: 100% natural ingredients
settings.text: We only use 100% natural, sustainably sourced ingredients and place particular emphasis on avoiding ingredients such as potassium sorbate, sodium benzoate and alcohol that are typically found in liquid supplements. Our individual sachet servings ensure that no oxidation takes place and that each serving is as effective as the last.

settings.title: In a shop near you
settings.text:
You can find our Zooki products in Holland & Barret, Planet Organic, as buyer's pick in Wholefoods or online at Boots and QVC. Not to mention all the lovely independent pharmacies and health food stores across the UK and Europe.

We're even stocked by the pharmacists to Her Majesty The Queen, John Bell & Croyden, who in March recommended our Vitamin C Zooki as the top "immunity-supporting" supplement in Tatler magazine.

settings.title: We 🧡 our NHS
settings.text:
Between March and July, we sent out 1083 care-packages of our Vitamin C Zooki to NHS staff to help support their immune systems and energy levels while working on the frontline.

You can read more about the initiative and those involved by following the link below.

settings.title: Heading

settings.title: Are your products considered weight-loss/diet supplements?
settings.answer: Our products are not dietary supplements, however, because of all the balanced nutrients and plant-protein, they may help improve your overall diet! Every BODY is different, and everyone requires a different amount of food and nutrients, so please consult with a professional for more information on diet/weight-loss programs.

settings.title: How long do your products last?
settings.answer: Our products have a long shelf life, but they do all each include expiry dates. Please make sure to read what the expiry date is on each package, and enjoy before that!

settings.title: Can I recycle the product packaging?
settings.answer: All of our packaging is 100% recyclable. The mailers/shipping packaging is also 100% compostable – being environmentally friendly and sustainable is a top priority for us.

settings.title: Are your products safe to consume while pregnant or breastfeeding?
settings.answer: Absolutely! There are no ingredients that would be harmful to either. However, if you are concerned, you may want to consult with your health care professional.

settings.title: Do you offer refunds?
settings.answer: If you don't love our products, please contact us within 14 days of purchase to set up a refund. Please note, we may require proof of purchase to consider your refund request.

settings.title: Do you ship internationally?
settings.answer: Currently, we only ship within Canada and the United States. We are working on shipping internationally though, so hold tight! We appreciate your patience and interest :)

settings.content_text: We're always happy to chat and help answer any questions you may have! Please note, we try our best to respond to all inquiries within 48 hours, Monday - Friday.

High in Omega 3 to support heart health, brain health and vision | Prepared for absorption | Great for the whole family

settings.title: A complete guide to Glutathione
settings.txt: "Glutathione (GSH) is often referred to as the body's master antioxidant. It is a tripeptide, ie., a very small protein, composed of three amino acids - cysteine, glycine, and glutamate. It can be found in almost every cell of the human body, the highest concentration being in the liver, and is vital in the body's detoxification process and natural defence system."

settings.text-box-content:
Our goal is to create a complete range of health supplements that have been uniquely tailored to the nutrients they deliver. We call them "Zooki".

Each Zooki is the result of years of research and takes on a slightly different approach based on how best to support the Bioavailability, Taste, Stability and Impact of the ingredient.

settings.h-txt: We take pride in making delicious, innovative health products

settings.title: Vitamin C Zooki
settings.text: Liposomal Vitamin C | Supports your immune system | Supports collagen formation | Contributes to the reduction of tiredness & fatigue
Tag @yourzooki for a chance to feature on our instagram

settings.tai_txt: Vitamin C Zooki is an on-the-go Liposomal Vitamin C. Vitamin C contributes to the normal function of the immune system, the reduction of tiredness and fatigue, normal psychological function and normal collagen formation.
settings.tai_3_txt: Add to your morning beauty routine
settings.tai_6_txt:
Take daily or when you
start to feel tired

settings.heading: Liposomal Vitamin C, without the nasty ingredients
settings.sub-txt-1: Vitamin C Zooki contains Vitamin C wrapped up in essential phospholipids
settings.sub-txt-2: Absolutely free from artificial flavours and preservatives
settings.sub-txt-3:
Unlike other Liposomal Vitamin Cs, 
Vitamin C Zooki is free from ethanol!
settings.sub-txt-4: Have straight from the sachet or add to smoothies, yoghurt, porridge, granola & more
settings.sub-txt-5:
A convenient hit of Liposomal Vitamin C 
for targeted support
settings.sub-txt-6:
Gluten free, soy free, dairy free, 
sugar free, vegan friendly
settings.ing-modal-content: Glycerin, Liposomal Vitamin C Proprietary Blend (Sunflower oil containing Phosphatidylcholine and Vitamin C as L-Ascorbic Acid), Purified Water, Natural Flavours (Citrus oil and Vanilla), Vitamin E, (D-Alpha-Tocopherol), Natural Colours (Beta Carotene), Potassium Bicarbonate, Sucrose (<0.1g)*, Oleic Acid, Acid (Citric Acid).

settings.dfu-txt: How often you take Vitamin C Zooki, Liposomal Vitamin C, is entirely up to you and will depend on why you are taking it. Vitamin C is a great way to support your immune system and energy levels when feeling run down, or you can take it everyday to support collagen formation and reduce oxidative stress.

settings.title: What are Liposomes?
settings.text: Liposomes are tiny bubbles made up from essential phospholipids - the same things that make up our cell membranes! | A dual layer of phospholipids form a sphere with an aqueous core where the Vitamin C can be held, shielded from the outside. The phospholipids that make up our Liposomes come from non-GMO sunflower oil high in phosphatidylcholine. | Read reviews

settings.title: 100% natural ingredients
settings.text: We wrap Vitamin C in Liposomes using only 100% natural ingredients and we don't use alcohol solvents, such as ethanol, that are typically found in liquid supplements. | Unlike most Vitamin C which is sourced from genetically modified corn syrup, we use a process known as the "Smirnoff-Wheeler (SW) pathway". This is the exact same pathway that oranges use to make Vitamin C and is the only natural method! | Read reviews

settings.title: On the go, targeted support
settings.text: Each sachet of Vitamin C Zooki contains 1000mg of Liposomal Vitamin C. We recommend taking one sachet daily or two when feeling run down. | Vitamin C contributes to the normal function of the immune system, the reduction of tiredness & fatigue, normal psychological function and to normal collagen formation in the skin, cartilage, joints, tendons, bones, gums and teeth. | Read reviews

settings.title: Great tasting Liposomal Vitamin C
settings.text: Vitamin C Zooki is flavoured using natural citrus and vanilla extracts, and has a sharp taste from the natural, plant-based glycerine we use to keep the liposomes stable. | Enjoy straight from the sachet, dilute it in water or add to smoothies, yoghurt, porridge, granola & more. Vitamin C Zooki is sugar free, gluten free, dairy free, soy free, non-GMO and vegan friendly. | Read reviews

settings.q: When is the best time to take Liposomal Vitamin C?
settings.a: If you want to be really strict then take it in the morning on an empty stomach, but generally speaking it won’t make a huge difference - most of our customers will have it with breakfast and it is sometimes nice to mix with water or some greek yoghurt. The main thing for efficacy is not leaving it out for a long time after you’ve broken the seal of the sachet - oxidation is the main threat to the stability of liposomes!

settings.q: How is Vitamin C Zooki different to other Liposomal Vitamin C products?
settings.a: Vitamin C Zooki is one of the only liposomal formulas on the market that doesn’t use ethanol or any artificial preservatives such as Potassium Sorbate. Perhaps the most notable thing of all though is the taste!!

settings.q: Why do we use sachets?
settings.a: The biggest enemy to a liposome is oxidation, so using sachets is essential for reasons of stability more than anything else. If we were to use a bottle, the moment the seal is broken a small amount of oxygen would creep in and the stability of the liposomes would be threatened. As time goes by each serving would be less and less effective. We are working closely with the leading sachet manufacturers in the UK to switch to a more environmentally friendly material, although at the moment a biodegradable sachet is not currently available.

settings.q: Is Liposomal Vitamin C safe for children?
settings.a: Vitamin C Zooki is generally safe for children, however we always recommend consulting with a medical professional before giving any dietary supplement to children under the age of 18. Young children under the age of 13 do not need a full sachet, and if they have too much it may temporarily upset their stomach. To manage how much to give to children, we recommend mixing with a small amount of water, adding it to yoghurt or giving it them off a teaspoon. We recommend ages 4 - 8 have up to one teaspoon daily and children 8 - 13  have half a sachet.

settings.q: Can I take Vitamin C Zooki if I’m pregnant or breastfeeding?
settings.a: We always recommend pregnant or nursing mothers, children under the age of 18 and individuals with a known medical condition consult a medical professional before taking any new dietary supplement.

settings.q: Is Vitamin C Zooki suitable for diabetics?
settings.a: Vitamin C Zooki is sugar free and perfectly fine to take if diabetic!

settings.q: Why is there glycerin in Vitamin C Zooki?
settings.a: We use organic, plant-based glycerin derived from coconuts to keep the moisture content low, the sweet taste and the liposomal vitamin c solution stable. We only use 100% natural, sustainably sourced ingredients and place particular emphasis  on avoiding ingredients such as potassium sorbate, sodium benzoate and alcohol.

settings.q: Is Vitamin C Zooki suitable for vegans?
settings.a: Yes, Vitamin C Zooki is made using 100% natural, sustainably sourced, non-GMO ingredients and is perfectly suitable for vegans.

settings.newsletter_title: Get the latest on products, ideas and health

settings.tai_txt: Omega 3 Zooki is an easy way for the whole family to enjoy a daily dose of Omega 3 and Vitamin D. Our water soluble formula prepares the nutrients for absorption in the gastrointestinal tract.
settings.tai_1_txt: Prepared for absorption in the gut
settings.tai_3_txt: Supports the function of the brain
settings.tai_6_txt: Now with Vitamin D for immune support

settings.sub-txt-4: Omega 3 Zooki is made with 100% natural ingredients and is free from heavy metals and toxins
settings.sub-txt-5: Enjoy straight off the spoon or add to water, smoothies, yoghurt, porridge and more

settings.dfu-txt: Each teaspoon of Omega 3 Zooki contains 375mg of Omega 3 EPA DHA and 100% of your RDA for Vitamin D. Adults can have up to two teaspoons (10ml) daily while children under the age of 13 can have up to one teaspoon (5ml) daily.

settings.title: Omega 3 fish oil, prepared for absorption
settings.text:
For fatty acids like Omega 3 to be absorbed into the blood, they first need to be made "water-soluble" in the gastro-intestinal tract.
 | We've made things easier for your body by making the Omega 3 water-soluble before it's even entered the body - all done using completely natural ingredients!

settings.title: Omega 3 fish oil for supporting brain health
settings.text: The brain is around 60% fat, most of which is Omega 3 DHA. DHA is an important building block for our cell membranes and brain’s structure, and is vital for the developing and maintaining our brain. As a natural anti-inflammatory, it can also help to reduce inflammation in the brain, preventing disrupted brain signals. | To support the normal function of your brain, adults should have two teaspoons daily and children one teaspoon daily.

settings.title: Omega 3 fish oil for supporting heart health
settings.text: Omega 3 EPA and Omega 3 DHA have been shown to contribute to normal functioning of the heart, normal blood pressure and normal triglyceride levels. It helps to lower triglycerides (unhealthy fats), which could potentially lead to fatty deposits in the artery walls. | To support the normal function of your heart, adults should have two teaspoons daily and children one teaspoon daily.

settings.title: Omega 3 fish oil for supporting vision
settings.text: Omega 3 DHA is heavily concentrated in the retina of our eyes, and is thought to be used to help regenerate the outer section of the eye used to process light, as well as help protect pigment cells from damage. | To support normal vision and eye health, adults should have two teaspoons daily and children one teaspoon daily.

settings.title: Now with Vitamin D!
settings.text: Each teaspoon of Omega 3 Zooki now contains 5μg of Vitamin D, adding support for your immune system, bones and muscle function to its list of benefits. | Typically referred to as the "sunshine vitamin", Vitamin D is naturally produced in the skin on contact with the sun's UV rays. The UK population is at particular risk of deficiency, especially in winter months, and the NHS currently recommend adults supplement with 10μg of Vitamin D daily if you don't think you can get enough from your diet. Vitamin D is naturally found in a small number of foods such as red meat, oily fish, liver and egg yolk.

settings.q: Where does your fish oil come from?
settings.a: All our fish oil comes from sustainably sourced mackerel and sardines from Norway.

settings.q: How much fish oil is in Omega 3 Zooki?
settings.a: Each teaspoon of Omega 3 Zooki Peach Mango contains 1500mg of pharmaceutical grade fish oil, of which 375mg is Omega 3 EPA DHA.

settings.q: Is Omega 3 Zooki suitable for Diabetics?
settings.a: Yes, Omega 3 Zooki is sugar free and is perfectly fine for Diabetics to take

settings.q: How much Omega 3 Zooki can I take in a day?
settings.a: You can take as much as you like, it won’t do you any harm. However, after 3 teaspoons you won’t get any further benefits from it, so we recommend taking 1-3 teaspoons a day.

settings.q: Can children take Omega 3 Zooki?
settings.a: We recommend adults take two teaspoons daily and children under the age of 13 have up to one teaspoon daily

settings.q: How much Omega 3 EPA and Omega 3 DHA is in a serving of Omega 3 Zooki?
settings.a: A 10ml adults serving contains 525mg of Omega 3 EPA and 225mg of Omega 3 DHA

settings.q: How long will a bottle last if I take it every day?
settings.a: Each bottle of Omega 3 Zooki contains 450ml, so 90 teaspoons. If there's one adult using the product and they take 2 teaspoons each day, a whole bottle will last for 45 days.

settings.title: CBD Oil
settings.text: American grown | CO2 extracted | 3rd party tested | Available in capsules or tincture style droppers

settings.promo_text: Description of promotion with lots of details.

settings.tai_heading: High quality CBD Oil you can trust
settings.tai_txt: When it comes to CBD Oil, everyone is different. We offer four different strengths of our CBD Oil in tincture style droppers, as well as a pack of 30 10mg CBD capsules.
settings.tai_2_txt: Sourced from high quality American Hemp
settings.tai_4_txt: Third party tested to ensure quality
settings.tai_6_txt: Choose from four different strengths or capsules

settings.title: What is CBD Oil?
settings.text: CBD is an extract from a Cannabis plant and stands for 'Cannabidiol' - a specific type of ‘Cannabinoid’. |  Cannabinoids are a group of over 100 compounds characterised by their similar shape and chemical composition. First discovered in the Cannabis plant - hence the name 'Cannabinoid' – they were later discovered to also be used inside the human body. | Our CBD is extracted from what we call "Hemp Cannabis" and is perfectly legal to be used as a food supplement in the UK.

settings.title: 3rd party tested CBD Oil
settings.text: All our CBD Oils are third party tested to not only ensure quality, but also compliance with UK and EU law. | Our CBD Oils are stocked and trusted by pharmacies across the UK, including the pharmacists to Her Majesty The Queen, John Bell & Croyden, as well as Harrods, Selfridges, Planet Organic and QVC. | If you'd like to see a certificate of analysis for one of our CBD products, please get in touch at hello@yourzooki.com

settings.title: High quality, great tasting American grown CBD Oil
settings.text: Our CBD is extracted from highly regulated American grown Hemp. Under current regulations, it is illegal to extract CBD from a Hemp plant in the UK - even though the CBD itself is perfectly legal and safe for us to use. | The great taste of our CBD oil is made possible by the quality of the extract, the addition of natural spearmint oils and our clean CO2 extraction method.

settings.title: Clean, CO2 extraction of CBD Oil
settings.text: Rather than using alcohol solvents, which leaves ethanol in the finished product, we use pressurised carbon dioxide to pull CBD and other phytonutrients from the hemp plant. | Supercritical Carbon dioxide is pumped through the hemp plant, extracting the cannabinoids, terpenes and flavonoids in the process. Once it’s been extracted, it flows into a chamber with a lower pressure that allows the CO2 to rise as a gas, leaving behind a clean oil extract.

settings.q: Will CBD Oil make me feel high?
settings.a: CBD in and of itself is non-psychoactive. However, when we extract from the Cannabis plant, although CBD is the main component, there are other cannabinoids and phytonutrients present. The psychoactive properties of Cannabis come from perhaps the most well-known of all the Cannabinoids: THC. So, whether or not a particular CBD Oil causes you to feel high, will depend on how much THC is in there. At YourZooki we make absolutely sure with 3rd party testing that there is any THC in our products.

settings.q: When should I take CBD Oil?
settings.a:
How often and when you take your CBD Oil will depend on what you are using it for. Many of our customers will start off by having a few drops in the morning and then a few more in the afternoon. Everyone is different, so it's about finding what works for you. You may find that having it once a day is enough!

Some people will also try having it in the evenings, about 1-2 hours before bed. We encourage you to experiment and find the best time of day for your own personal needs. It can also help to speak to friends and family that are also using CBD Oil to see what times of day works best for them.

You can use your CBD Oil up to 3 times daily and we recommend not exceeding a maximum of 70mg total CBD each day.

settings.q: Is it safe for everyone to use and are there any risks?
settings.a: Although CBD has always been present in Cannabis, it’s only relatively recently that it has been taken in high doses as a food supplement. As such, there aren’t many studies on the safety profile of CBD and as a precautionary measure, the FSA recommend that “healthy adults do not take more than 70mg a day, unless a doctor agrees more”. The FSA also advise against CBD for pregnant and breastfeeding women, and for people taking medication. If you do have any health concerns surrounding the supplementation of CBD, please contact a healthcare professional.

settings.q: What are the benefits of CBD Oil?
settings.a: The reported benefits of CBD Oil have so far been largely anecdotal and have spread quickly via word of mouth. Although research into CBD is accelerating, there is still a huge lack of clinical trials surrounding purported health benefits. That’s not to say that there aren’t any benefits to taking CBD Oil, but just that large-scale clinical trials haven’t been conducted yet.

settings.q: What research has there been on CBD Oil?
settings.a: CBD Oil has exploded in popularity in recent years, and it's no coincidence in timing. This recent spark in public interest is in part a result of the recent discovery of a whole new system inside the body: The Endocannabinoid System. This discovery, along with the subsequent revelations of its role inside the human body, led to an unprecedented boom in research into the cannabis plant starting in the 1990s. As research into cannabis and the Endocannabinoid System has started to mature, countries have started to legalise Cannabis for medicinal use to help ease restrictions on further research. In fact, since the discovery of the Endocannabinoid System in 1992, 33 countries, including the UK, Canada, France, Germany and Italy, along with 32 US states, have legalised cannabis for medicinal use.

settings.q: What is the "Endocannabinoid System"?
settings.a: The Endocannabinoid System is a complex series of receptors spread throughout the human body that we now know is responsible for regulating some of our most vital life functions. Our immune system, sleep, mood, pain and stress response have all been linked to the endocannabinoid system… go back 30 years however, we didn't even know it existed!

settings.q: What is the role of the Endocannabinoid System?
settings.a:
Endocannabinoids respond to counteract changes in our body. If our body, or a system within our body, is working as it should and is in equilibrium, then we say it is in a state of homeostasis. If something external happens that throws us out of homeostasis, then Endocannabinoids work to bring us back to normality and a state of equilibrium. In a way, their job is to ensure balance.

This is how Endocannabinoids regulate some of our most vital life functions - acting as messengers between different parts of the body and even influencing our emotions and feelings. They’re produced after exercise, when we’re hungry, in a response to pain, or stress or anxiety. They make sure our bones get repaired, our food gets properly digested, and that our immune system deals with tissue inflammation in a measured way. For example, if we are stressed, endocannabinoids work to destress us. If we need food, our Endocannabinoid System gives us an appetite. If tissue is damaged or inflamed, our Endocannabinoid System goes into overdrive to let our body know that it’s damaged and that it needs repairing.

settings.q: It's my first time taking CBD Oil, which strength should I take?
settings.a: If it’s your first time taking CBD Oil, you’re probably better off taking one of our lower percentages, either the 3% or 10%, before working your way up to a higher strength.

settings.q: What do the percentages mean?
settings.a: The percentages refer to the CBD content, essentially the strength of the CBD Oil. The 3% contains 300mg of CBD, the 10% contains 1000mg and so on.

settings.heading: Hemp cannabis extract, without the psychoactive effects
settings.sub-txt-1: "Within minutes I feel… not drowsy, but the sort of deep relaxation that comes from an hour’s back massage. It is bliss."

settings.dfu-txt: When using CBD Oil for the first time, start with just a few drops below the tongue each day, holding for 60 seconds before swallowing. Over the course of your first week, up the dose towards the directions on the bottle or until you find a dose that works for you.

settings.dfu-txt: A box of Glutathione Zooki comes with 3 oral syringes, each containing 10 servings. Use the measurements on the side of the syringe to squeeze a 1ml serving out onto a spoon. Have straight or add to food and drink. Once you've removed the cap off a syringe, store refrigerated and make sure to re-seal the syringe in between servings.

settings.title: What makes Glutathione Zooki different?
settings.text: Like all of the Zooki range, Glutathione Zooki has been uniquely tailored to the nutrient it delivers. | Each serving contains 100mg of Glutathione wrapped in “Liposomes”, tastes great and contains only 100% natural ingredients. Our oral syringes are designed to maximise the stability of Glutathione and ensure that each serving is as potent as the last. | Read reviews

settings.title: What are Liposomes?
settings.text: Liposomes are tiny bubbles made up from essential phospholipids - the same things that make up our cell membranes! | A dual layer of phospholipids form a sphere with an aqueous core where the Glutathione can be held, shielded from the outside. The phospholipids that make up our Liposomes come from non-GMO sunflower oil high in phosphatidylcholine. | Read reviews

settings.title: Expertly administered Glutathione
settings.text: One of the biggest roles of Glutathione in the body is to “oxidise”. By donating its electrons, Glutathione neutralises free radicals that harm cells. However, what makes Glutathione such a potent antioxidant, also makes it vulnerable to oxidising (denaturing) outside of the body. | By using oral syringes that are completely sealed from oxygen, we ensure that as much active Glutathione as possible makes it into the body. | Read reviews

settings.title: 100% natural ingedients
settings.text: We wrap Glutathione in Liposomes using only natural ingredients, and we don't use alcohol solvents, such as ethanol, that are typically found in liquid supplements. | Glutathione Zooki is flavoured with natural orange, cinnamon, clove and vanilla extracts and can be taken straight from the spoon, diluted in water or added to yoghurt, smoothies, porridge, granola and more. | Read reviews

settings.q: Is Glutathione Zooki suitable for children?
settings.a: Glutathione Zooki is generally safe for children, however we always recommend consulting with a medical professional before giving any dietary supplement to children under the age of 18.

settings.q: Why does Glutathione Zooki come in oral syringes?
settings.a: What makes Glutathione such a powerful antioxidant also means Glutathione easily oxidises when exposed to oxygen. In order to ensure that it doesn't denature, it's best to be kept airtight before use, which is why we keep it in our oral syringes!

settings.q: Is Glutathione Zooki suitable for diabetics?
settings.a: Glutathione Zooki is sugar free and perfectly safe for diabetics to use

settings.q: Can I take Glutathione Zooki if I'm pregnant or breastfeeding?
settings.a: We always recommend pregnant or nursing mothers, children under the age of 18 and individuals with a known medical condition consult a medical professional before taking any new dietary supplement.

settings.q: Why is there Glycerin in Glutathione Zooki?
settings.a: We use organic, plant-based glycerin derived from coconuts to keep the moisture content low, the sweet taste and the liposomal Glutathione solution stable. We only use 100% natural, sustainably sourced ingredients and place particular emphasis on avoiding ingredients such as potassium sorbate, sodium benzoate and alcohol.

settings.q: Why does Glutathione Zooki contain Lactoferrin?
settings.a: We bind Glutathione with Lactoferrin to improve bioavailability and stability

settings.q: Is Glutathione Zooki suitable for Vegans?
settings.a: Glutathione Zooki contains small amount of Lactoferrin derived from Milk. We bind Glutathione with Lactoferrin to improve bioavailability and stability.

settings.q: Can Glutathione increase energy levels?
settings.a: One of the cell functions worst affected by oxidative stress is the ability to produce energy. Energy production occurs in almost all cells in the body inside our ‘mitochondria’: the ‘powerhouses’ of each cell. If mitochondria are damaged by oxidative molecules, they slow down their energy production and cause the rest of the cell to become sluggish and under functioning. | Glutathione and Vitamin B2 protect cells against oxidative stress and contribute to the reduction of tiredness and fatigue.

settings.q: Can Glutathione help my skin?
settings.a: Sun, wind, UV rays and exposure to toxins in the environment can cause damage to skin overtime, resulting in dry, wrinkled skin and age spots.  | Glutathione Zooki contains both Glutathione and Vitamin B2, contributing to the maintenance of normal skin and to the protection of skin cells against oxidative stress caused by environmental factors and ageing.

settings.tai_heading: The ultimate beauty and health supplement
settings.tai_txt: Each sachet of Collagen Zooki contains 5000mg of Hydrolysed, Marine Collagen wrapped in "Liposomes" and 30mg of Vitamin C. Vitamin C contributes to normal collagen formation for the normal function of skin, cartilage, bones, gums and teeth.

settings.title: A "groundbreaking" collagen supplement
settings.text: Collagen Zooki is recommended by award-winning Facial Aesthetician Dr Nina Bal as "a groundbreaking collagen drink for whoever is looking to maintain or restore a young looking hydrated skin and healthy body." | It supports natural collagen formation in the skin, but also in our muscles, cartilage, bones, gums, teeth, blood vessels and organs.⁠

settings.title: What makes Collagen Zooki Different?
settings.text: Like all of the Zooki range, Collagen Zooki has been uniquely tailored to the nutrient it delivers. | We use marine collagen, hydrolyse it into individual collagen peptides and then wrap it in Liposomes - all done using 100% natural ingredients. | The result is an easy-to-take daily sachet that provides advanced support for overall health, wellbeing and beauty from within.

settings.title: How does Collagen Zooki work?
settings.text: Liposomes are tiny bubbles made up from essential phospholipids, the exact same thing that surround our cells! | By wrapping collagen peptides in phospholipids, we create a barrier around the collagen that protects it from the harsh environment of the digestive system. The phospholipids that make up our Liposomes come from non-GMO sunflower oil high in phosphatidylcholine.

settings.title: Liposomal hydrolysed marine collagen
settings.text: We use marine collagen because it's richer in "Type 1" collagen - the most abundant form of collagen found within the body - compared to bovine or porcine. We then hydrolyse it into individual collagen peptides that are easier for your body to absorb and transport around the body. | Collagen Zooki is flavoured with natural lime extracts and can be taken straight from the sachet or mixed with water, smoothies, yoghurt, porridge, granola and more.

settings.dfu-txt: Each box of Collagen Zooki comes with 14 sachets, which can be enjoyed straight or added to water, smoothies, yoghurt porridge, granola and more. Take Collagen Zooki in the morning as part of your morning routine or save it for after a workout - it's entirely up to you!
